title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might sense that a new period of focus and accomplishment is dawning, empowering you to forge ahead with a stalled project. Reassess where you are currently standing and where you want to go while strategic Saturn turns direct in your 1st House of Self. Perhaps you feel as if you can make up for lost time; however, dont rush toward the finish line today. Saturn plays the long game, so map out concrete steps you can take over the next several weeks. Think of this endeavor as a marathon and not a sprint. Train for endurance not speed. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
